rooms.description: Vastu-compliant entryway with proper directional alignment ensuring positive energy flow.
Open-plan living space integrated with the kitchen area; designed to promote natural light and ventilation as per Vastu.
Modern open-plan kitchen adjoining living area, adhering to Brutalist aesthetic with raw concrete finishes and functional layout.
Spacious bedroom designed for joint family usage; includes a private bathroom attached to maintain privacy as per Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom designed for extended family members or guests; maintains balance with other living spaces.
A dedicated entertainment space integrated within the ground floor to host family movie nights and events; includes sound insulation compliant with Vastu and local building norms.
Open courtyard at the center of the layout fostering communal interaction and natural ventilation; includes a water feature aligned with Vastu for prosperity.

openings.description: Primary entrance designed to be auspicious according to Vastu norms; features a welcoming pathway.
Provides natural light and a view of the courtyard, aligning with Vastu principles for harmony.
Strategically placed windows to maximize light and ventilation in the living room.
Ensures proper ventilation and natural lighting for cooking space.
